meanings.definition: A type of beer brewed in Baltimore, Maryland.
meanings.sent1: I tried a new bohs at the local brewery.
meanings.sent2: The bar had a great selection of bohs for us to choose from.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone was enjoying the bohs and having a good time.
meanings.sent4: The bohs flowed like a river at the summer festival.
meanings.sent5: The refreshing taste of bohs lingered on my tongue.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a person from Baltimore, especially a fan of the Baltimore Orioles baseball team.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a true bohs and never misses a game.
meanings.sent2: The bohs in the stands cheered loudly for their team.
meanings.sent3: I bumped into a fellow bohs at the grocery store wearing Orioles gear.
meanings.sent4: She was as loyal to the Orioles as any bohs could be.
meanings.sent5: The bohs proudly displayed their team spirit with orange and black.
